adversarial_frontend_patterns.name: Wizard-Style Flow with Default Path
adversarial_frontend_patterns.description: Multi-step wizard where first step has pre-selected option, user can change but default is provided
adversarial_frontend_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates factual default and compresses decision space

adversarial_frontend_patterns.name: Quick Access Panel with Frequently Used
adversarial_frontend_patterns.description: Prominent panel showing 'quick access' to frequently used capabilities, ordered by usage frequency
adversarial_frontend_patterns.why_it_looks_reasonable: Improves efficiency by providing quick access
adversarial_frontend_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates factual default and compresses decision space

adversarial_frontend_patterns.name: Recently Used Section
adversarial_frontend_patterns.description: Separate section displaying 'recently used' capabilities, limited to top 5, ordered by recency
adversarial_frontend_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates factual default and compresses decision space

adversarial_frontend_patterns.name: Auto-Complete with Ranking
adversarial_frontend_patterns.description: Input field with auto-complete suggestions, suggestions ranked by popularity, top suggestion pre-highlighted
adversarial_frontend_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates factual default and compresses decision space

adversarial_frontend_patterns.name: Hide Low-Frequency Options by Default
adversarial_frontend_patterns.description: Options used less than 5 times are hidden by default, user must click 'Show more' to reveal
adversarial_frontend_patterns.why_it_violates: Compresses decision space and creates factual defaults

adversarial_frontend_patterns.name: Pre-Expanded Category Panel
adversarial_frontend_patterns.description: Category panel expanded by default showing 'most common' category, other categories collapsed
adversarial_frontend_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates factual default and compresses decision space

adversarial_frontend_patterns.name: Template Buttons for Common Workflows
adversarial_frontend_patterns.description: Pre-configured buttons labeled 'Standard Process', 'Common Workflow', 'Quick Start', executing capability combinations
adversarial_frontend_patterns.why_it_looks_reasonable: Provides ready-made solutions for common tasks
adversarial_frontend_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates factual defaults and workflow semantics

adversarial_frontend_patterns.name: Smart Defaults Based on Context
adversarial_frontend_patterns.description: Form fields pre-filled with 'smart' values based on previous submissions, context, or common patterns
adversarial_frontend_patterns.why_it_looks_reasonable: Saves user time by pre-filling common values
adversarial_frontend_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates factual defaults and compresses decision space

adversarial_frontend_patterns.name: Suggested Next Step After Action
adversarial_frontend_patterns.description: After completing an action, UI displays 'Suggested next step' or 'You might want to' with specific capability highlighted
adversarial_frontend_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates explicit recommendation and compresses decision space

adversarial_frontend_patterns.name: Category Navigation with Default Category
adversarial_frontend_patterns.description: Navigation organized by categories, 'Most Used' category displayed first and expanded by default
adversarial_frontend_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates factual default and compresses decision space

adversarial_frontend_patterns.name: Search Results Ranked by Popularity
adversarial_frontend_patterns.description: Search functionality returns results ordered by popularity or usage frequency, top 3 results highlighted
adversarial_frontend_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates factual default and compresses decision space

adversarial_frontend_patterns.name: Progressive Disclosure with Smart Expansion
adversarial_frontend_patterns.description: Initial view shows subset of options, system automatically expands based on user behavior or context
adversarial_frontend_patterns.why_it_violates: Compresses decision space and creates factual defaults

adversarial_frontend_patterns.name: Contextual Help with Action Suggestions
adversarial_frontend_patterns.description: Help text appears based on context, suggests specific actions, highlights recommended capabilities
adversarial_frontend_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates recommendation and compresses decision space

adversarial_frontend_patterns.name: Tab Organization with Default Active Tab
adversarial_frontend_patterns.description: Content organized into tabs, 'Common' tab active by default, other tabs require explicit switching
adversarial_frontend_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates factual default and compresses decision space

adversarial_frontend_patterns.name: Filter Presets Based on Common Usage
adversarial_frontend_patterns.description: Pre-configured filter combinations labeled 'Popular Filters', 'Common Searches', based on usage statistics
adversarial_frontend_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates factual defaults and compresses decision space
